attributes.action: Revise legislation to deprive prisoners of access to social networking sites such as Facebook, Bebo, Myspace etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a law-abiding taxpayer, I am fed-up of reading about how prisoners use social networking sites to boast about how 'cushy' they have it in prison, to taunt their victims etc. I believe that incarceration should mean being deprived of such luxuries that ordinary citizens have to pay for.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
